ingredients.content: 3 oz yellow onions, cut into pieces
fresh bird's eye chilies or fresh pequin chilies, to taste

preparations.content: Place onions, chilies, garlic and oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.<b>
Add water, salt and epazote and cook <b>6 min/195°F//speed 2<b>.<b>
Divide mixture into 8 serving glasses and add 1 tsp mayonnaise, 1 tsp cheese and ¼ lime to each glass. Serve with chilies on the side, to taste.
